snippet: A 10-year-old conflated one set of Super Bowl champion Giants with an idealized moral philosophy; his adult self realized later champions’ human reality.
abstract: Box Seats article by author Greg Hanlon recalls New York Giants 1990 Super Bowl championship season.
lead_paragraph: A 10-year-old conflated one set of Super Bowl champion Giants with an idealized moral philosophy; his adult self realized later champions’ human reality.

headline.main: One Fan’s Life Lessons, From Heroes and Humans
headline.print_headline: One Fan’s Life Lessons, From Heroes and Humans
